description.part1: The IPTV Smarters App is a fabulous video streaming player that allows your IPTV customers or end-users to stream content like Live TV, VOD, Series, and TV Catchup supplied by you; on their Android & iOS devices, Smart TV, and even on macOS/Windows PC/Laptop.
description.part2: Following is a comprehensive list of the devices supported by IPTV Smarters Pro.
description.android: Android Phones, Android TV, Android TV Boxes, Android FireTV Sticks, Nvidia Shields, and other android sticks or devices.
description.smart: LG & Samsung (App available on the store to download).
description.windows: Following is a comprehensive list of the devices supported by IPTV Smarters Pro.

features.title: Features Overview
features.1: Live, Movies, Series and Radio Streaming Supported
features.4: EPG ( TV Program Guide) Improvements with ext. Sources
features.5: Ability to change the buffer size for the VIDEO Player(NEW)Parental Controls
features.10: M3u File and URL Loading Supported
features.11: Support: Local Audio / Video file Playing
features.14: Bugs fixes and many more improvements
features.16: Speed Test facility Integrated Support: Dynamic language switching
features.19: New Controls on the Media Player
features.21: Support: Clear Cache automatically and Manually
features.23: The new way to download the content
features.24: Load Your Playlist Or File/URL Improvements
features.25: Ability to open the channel list on the video Player
features.26: Ability to open “ List of episodes” on the video Player

rebranding.title: Rebranding
rebranding.heading: A fully Customised & Brand-able App for OTT Service Providers

pro.title: IPTV Smarters Pro - Smart TV
pro.description: IPTV Smarters is an incredible video streaming player which is developed especially for end-users that want to be provided with the facility to watch live TV, VOD, Series and TV Catchup on their Smart TV. This video player app is easy to use and yet highly efficient with a powerful player, attractive and very impressive layout and most importantly user-friendly.

items.4: Player Selection and External Players Support

ios.heading: For iOS
ios.text: You have to download the Application from the apple store and buy premium from in-app purchase

smart.heading: For Smart TV
smart.text: It's free IPTV Player for end-users.

android.step2: Login to the application with your subscription details ( Get details from your service provider)
android.step3: After Login >> Get Premium Version to unlocked exclusive features.

ios.step2: Login to the application with your subscription details ( Get details from your service provider)
ios.step3: After Login >> Get Premium Version to unlocked exclusive features.

windows.step2: Login to the application with your subscription details ( Get details from your service provider)
windows.message: The Premium Version features are not available for Win/Mac

step1.1: Download IPTV Smarters pro direct apk

firestick.step2: Download the downloader app on firestick.
firestick.step3: Go to settings of firestick >> My Fire TV >> Developer Options >> Install from unknown apps >> Click Downloader to change the status to ON.
firestick.step4: Open the downloader app and put the complete apk link on downloader and then install the app.

samsung.heading: For Samsung Smart TV
samsung.step3: Log in the Application with your subscription details i.e. Username, Password, Portal URL.

note.1: Make sure, Your Service providers got their DNS registered with us.

lg.heading: For LG Smart TV

step1.3: on the remote & Go to LG Content Store.

lg.step3: Log in the Application with your subscription details i.e. Username, Password, Portal URL.
lg.message: The Premium Version Features are not available for Samsung/LG

note.1: Make sure, Your Service providers got their DNS registered with us.

note.heading: Note
note.text: We don't provide or Sell any Subscriptions, Stream and Content. We are a Software Development Company.

items.1: YOU HEREBY AGREE TO TERMS HERE OTHERWISE DO NOT USE THE APP.
items.2: IPTV Smarters is an advanced player that uses M3U and JSON user-created playlists.
items.3: We do not provide any actual playlists or contents.
items.4: This application is designed to use with the user's own or created playlist with legal contents.
items.5: You are responsible to check your created playlists/contents are legal and you have full rights to use and/or RECORD contents.
items.6: We are not responsible for misuse of copyright or third party contents using our software and please check your contents are legal and/or you have rights to use and/or RECORD.
items.7: By using our application means you accept the above terms and conditions

items.1: IPTV Smarters does not provide or solicit any audiovisual content to the users.
items.2: IPTV Smarters has no affiliation with any third-party provider what so ever.
items.3: Users must provide their own contents
items.4: We strictly do not endorse the streaming of copyright-protected material without permission of the copyright holder
